S06adhsatpu:3_0: AśP 1. evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajrādhiṣṭhānasamayajñānavividhaviśeṣasamanvāgataḥ
S06adhsatpu:13: AśP 3. evaṃ pramukhābhir aṣṭābhir bodhisattvakoṭībhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S06adhsatpu:14: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanam kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ sarvadharmaviśuddhimukhaṃ brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma //
S06adhsatpu:17: tadyathā (1) surataviśuddhipadam etad yat uta bodhisattvapadam /
S06adhsatpu:39: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaviśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiteti //
S06adhsatpu:40_1: prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sakṛd api śroṣyati tasyā bodhimaṇḍāt sarvajñeyāvaraṇakleśāvaraṇakarmāvaraṇāni
S06adhsatpu:40_2: mahānty apy upacinvato na kadācid api narakādyapāyopapattir bhaviṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:41: pāpāni ca kṛtamātrāṇy aduḥkhataḥ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S06adhsatpu:42: yaś ca dhārayiṣyati dine dine vācayiṣyati svādhyāyiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ihaiva janmani sarvadharmasamatāvajrasamādhipratilambhāt sarvadharmeśvaro bhaviśyati /
S06adhsatpu:44: ṣoḍaśame mahābodhisattvajanmani tathāgatatvaṃ pratilapsyate vajradharatvaṃ ceti //
S06adhsatpu:45_0: AśP 6. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayaḥ sarvamaṇḍalaḥ sakalavajradhātvagryasattvaḥ
S06adhsatpu:45_3: udyotayan prahasitavadanas tad ādyaṃ mahāvajram vāmagarvollālanatayā svahṛdyutkarṣaṇayogena
S06adhsatpu:47: AśP 7. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sarvatathāgatavajradharmatābhisaṃbodhinirhāraṃ nāma deśayati sma /
S06adhsatpu:52: AśP 8. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imāṃś caturo dharmavihārāñ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvapāpasamācāro 'pi sarvāpāyasamatikrānto bhaviṣyaty ā bodhimaṇḍāt* /
S06adhsatpu:54: AśP 9. athedam uktvā bhagavāñ jñānamuṣṭiparigraha idam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan smitamukha idaṃ sarvadharmasamatāhṛdayam abhāṣata / vajra āḥ //
S06adhsatpu:55: AśP 10. atha bhagavān sarvaduṣṭavinayanaśākyamunis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvadharmasamatāvijayasaṅgrahaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānirhāram abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:60_0: AśP 11. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati
S06adhsatpu:60_1: bhāvayiṣyati tasya traidhātukopapannān api sarvasattvān prapātayato nāpāyagamanaṃ
S06adhsatpu:62_0: AśP 12. atha vajrapāṇir imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayaṃs trilokavijayavajrāṃ
S06adhsatpu:62_2: pratyālīḍhasthānastha idaṃ vajrahūṃkāraṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / vajra hūṃ //
S06adhsatpu:63: AśP 13. atha bhagavān svabhāvaviśuddhadharmatāprāptas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvadharmasamatāvalokiteśvarajñānamudraṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:68: AśP 14. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ nayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayisyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvarāgamadhyasthito 'pi padmam iva rāgadoṣair na malair āgantukair lepaṃ yāsyati /
S06adhsatpu:70_0: AśP 15. atha bhagavān avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā
S06adhsatpu:70_2: idaṃ sarvajagadviśvarūpapadmaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / hrīḥ //
S06adhsatpu:71: AśP 16. atha bhagavān sarvatraidhātukādhipatis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekasambhavajñānagarbhaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:76_0: AśP 17. athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prahasitavadano bhūtvā svaśirasi vajraratnābhiṣekamālām
S06adhsatpu:76_1: avabandhayann imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayann idaṃ sarvābhiṣekasamayaratnaṃ
S06adhsatpu:77_0: AśP 18. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatajñānamudrāprāptaḥ sarvatathāgatamuṣṭidharaḥ sarvatathāgataḥ
S06adhsatpu:77_1: śāśvataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānamudrādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ nāma prajñāparamitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:82_0: AśP 19. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imam dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty
S06adhsatpu:82_1: uddeksyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvasiddhīḥ sarvasaṃpattīḥ sarvajñānāni sarvakāryāṇi
S06adhsatpu:85_0: AśP 20. atha bhagavān vajramuṣṭir mahāsamayavajramudrāparigraha imam evārthaṃ bhūyasyā
S06adhsatpu:85_1: mātrayoddīpayan prahasitavadana idaṃ sarvadṛḍhavajramudrāsiddhisamayaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata / aḥ //
S06adhsatpu:86: AśP 21. atha bhagavān sarvadharmasamatāprapañcas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ cakrākṣaraparivartaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:92: AśP 32. ...t* tatra mahāvajreśvara idaṃ tattvahṛdayam agāt* /
S06adhsatpu:94_0: AśP 33. atha bhagavān anantāparyantaniṣṭhas tathāgato 'paryantāniṣṭhadharmā punar
S06adhsatpu:99: AśP 33*. vajra oṃ sarvadharmatāprapañco hili sarvadharmatā mili sarvānurāgiṇi svāhā //
S06adhsatpu:100_0: AśP 34. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty
S06adhsatpu:100_1: uddekṣyati pravartayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati tasyāniṣṭhāṃ buddhabodhisattvacaryāṃ gatvā
S06adhsatpu:102: oṃ bhagavann ārāt pāraṃ viśodhaya svāhā //
S06adhsatpu:104: AśP 35. atha sarvatathāgatāḥ samājam āgamyāsya dharmaparyāyasyāmogham apratihatāśusiddhyarthaṃ vajrapāṇaye sādhukāram adāt*
S06adhsatpu:105: sādhu sādhu mahāsattva sādhu sādhu mahāsukha /
S06adhsatpu:106: sādhu sādhu mahāyāna sādhu sādhu mahāmate // 1//
S06adhsatpu:110: adhṛṣṭāś cāghatavyāś ca sarvamārādibhis tu te // 3 //
S06adhsatpu:114: idam uktvā tu sarvāgrāḥ sarvabuddhāḥ sasauraghanāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:116_0: AśP 37. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgataguhyadharmatāprāptaḥ sarvadharmāprapañcaḥ
S06adhsatpu:130: tāvat sattvārtham atulaṃ śaktāḥ kartum anirvṛtāḥ // 6 //
S06adhsatpu:134: rāgādivinayo loka ā bhavāt pāpakṛt sadā /
S06adhsatpu:135: teṣāṃ viśodhanārthaṃ tu vinayanty ā bhavāt svayam // 8 //
S06adhsatpu:136: yathā padmaṃ suraktaṃ tu rāgadoṣair na lipyate /
S06adhsatpu:137: vāsadoṣair bhave nityaṃ na lipyante jagaddhitāḥ // 9 //
S06adhsatpu:141_0: AśP 39. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ paramādyam prajñāpāramitānayamukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S06adhsatpu:141_1: dine dine kālyam utthāyoccārayiṣyati śroṣyati vā sa sarvasukhasaumanasyalābhī mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayasiddhim
S06adhsatpu:143: AśP 40. atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiṃ guhyakādhipatim āmantrayate sma /
S06adhsatpu:187: oṃ aṃ vaṃ hūṃ oṃ aḥ // 22 //
S06adhsatpu:194: AśP 42. nāyaṃ vajrapāṇe 'navaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:195: nāpy anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ śakyo likhituṃ paṭhituṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum* /
S06adhsatpu:196: anyatra bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukham dharmaparyāyam antaśa ekākṣaram api śroṣyanti /
S06adhsatpu:198_1: satkṛtāni na gurukṛtāni na mānitāni na pūjitāni bhavanti tena na śakyo 'ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukho
S06adhsatpu:199: tasmāc caityabhūtaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:200: vandanīyaś ca sa pudgalo bahukalpakoṭī bhaviṣyati yasyāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ kāyagato vā pustakagato vā bhaviṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:202: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ kariṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:203: catvāraś cāsya mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye anyāś ca devatāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:206: samāsato yatra buddhakṣetre ākāṅkṣiṣyate tatra tatropapatsyate /
S06adhsatpu:208: api ca pradeśamātraṃ mayā kīrtitam iti //
S06adhsatpu:210: āttamanaso vajrapāṇipramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
